text: Bridei III (616-693) was King of the Picts from 672 until 693,Woolf, "Pictish matriliny reconsidered", pp. 160â€“162. he defeated the Northumbrian king Ecgfrith and killed him at the Battle of Nechtansmere in 685. == References == Category:610s births Category:690s deaths Category:Kings and Queens of Scotland
title: Bridei III
